column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=( ( WN ) )
#Text=What is the nature of your disability ?
#Text=Do you use a wheelchair for most daily activities ?
#Text=DP : I am a T4 Paraplegic , due to a motorcycle accident in 1993 .
#Text=Yes I am dependent on my wheelchair for mobility .
#Text=( ( WN ) ) How does being a parent impact your ability to compete at elite levels ?
#Text=DP : I am married and have three children .
#Text=Having a family does make it a harder to compete at elite levels , not only being away traveling , when I am home I am on the ice training a lot .
#Text=But thanks to the support from my family I have been able to do so .
#Text=Hopefully it has a positive impact on my children , showing them you can achieve anything you put your mind to .
#Text=( ( WN ) ) Does participating in wheelchair curling cost a lot money ?

#Text=DP : Well that depends ! At a recreational level , if you have a wheelchair already all you need is a delivery stick which is about $ 60.00 and to join a club which has dues usually 300.00 to 500.00 per year .
#Text=To compete at the highest level , there is travel and lodging involved which can get quite expensive .
#Text=( ( WN ) ) How do you afford to compete at the highest level ?
#Text=Do you have any sponsorship deals ?
#Text=DP : Getting started was tough , I got help through the members of cape cod curling club and a grant from Challenged Athletes Foundation ( CAF ) and some out of my pocket .
#Text=But once I made the National team there is funding to help with expenses .
#Text=I have no sponsorship deals at the moment , but I am open to negotiation !
#Text=( ( WN ) ) Do you think USA Paralympic competitors get enough financial support to enable the country to compete at the highest level ?
#Text=Is funding equitable in the United States across sports and competitor visibility ?
#Text=DP : No , there is funding , but not nearly enough for an athlete to compete at the highest level .
#Text=DP : Not from what I hear .
#Text=I believe the higher viewed sports get a lot more funding .
#Text=I have been told curling is at bottom for funding .
#Text=( ( WN ) ) What are your thoughts on the classification system and processes for your sport ?
#Text=Do you know of anyone who has been impacted as a result of it ?
#Text=DP : I am not really clear on how the classification system works .
#Text=I feel that they should make it as equal as possible for everyone who competes in wheelchair curling .

#Text=Everyone one has different disabilities and different situations , but as long as they are delivering the stone from a stationary wheelchair with a delivery stick from the same position it should be equal .
#Text=DP : I know of a young man from state of Washington who uses a wheelchair most of the time but is able to walk and has mobility , that he probably would not qualify for the national team. .
#Text=Yet I know of a man in Canada that uses a wheelchair only for curling and competes on the National team .
